scripts.build:docker: npm run lint:dockerignore && npm run docker:images:include && scripts/docker_build.sh
scripts.build:docker:alpine: docker-compose -f docker-compose-alpine.yml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f docker-compose-alpine.yml up
scripts.check:code: tools/composer.phar run parallel-lint && concurrently -g --timings npm:check:size npm:lint npm:analysis
scripts.clean:temp: rm -rf test-results/ && rm -rf tmp/og/ && find tmp/ -maxdepth 1 -type f \( -name '*.html' -o -name '*.json' ! -name assets-sizes.json \) -delete && find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name '*.html' -delete
scripts.docker:images:include: if strings "$(command -v sed)" | grep -q -F -m 1 "FreeBSD"; then sed -i '' '/^src\/images$/d' .dockerignore; else sed -i '/^src\/images$/d' .dockerignore; fi
scripts.docker:alpine:up: docker-compose -f docker-compose-alpine.yml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f docker-compose-alpine.yml up

scripts.lint:docker: command -v hadolint >/dev/null 2>&1 && hadolint .docker/*Dockerfile || echo 'hadolint not found, skipping docker linting'
scripts.lint:shellcheck: for file in $(find scripts -type f -name '*.sh' -not -name '*.generated.sh'); do shellcheck "$file" || exit 1; done
scripts.postinstall: yes | php -d memory_limit=256M tools/phive install --force-accept-unsigned && tools/composer.phar install && npx playwright install
scripts.prepare:deploy: npm run export:db && npm run refresh:test-data && npm run test && npm run export:commonvoice && npm run generate:reports && npm run docker:images:ignore
